name: TankWar (Fer)
description:
Tank War it's a mini turn based tactic game with procedurally generated levels.

this game born from my desire of playing battle city or into the breach in my phone, but i couldn't find a game like those so I've made a mash up of both.

How to play

move the blue tank with the Arrows or WASD.

Shoot by pressing  SPACE and then select with the Arrows or WASD the direction to shoot, you can cancel this with SHIFT.

How to play in Android

move the blue tank with the D-pad.

Shoot by pressing the A button and then select with the D-pad the direction to shoot, you can cancel this with the B button.

Tips

The gun loads after two turns.

The red tanks will tell you where they're going to move in the next turn so you can plan your next move.  

If you are in their line of sight on the next turn they will shoot you, so be careful.
